resources.string: BlockButton is a view that extends LinearLayout. I\'m thinking of extending RelativeLayout as well and release it.
Read External Storage permissions is needed to select Image. Please turn on requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.

Camera and External Storage permissions are needed to capture image. Turning off any permission won\'t allow application run smoothly. Please turn on all requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.
Storage permissions are needed to Pick Gallery Image. Please turn on requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.
Camera and Storage permissions are needed to capture image. Please all both requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.
